boat.full_description:
Made by the company Padstow Sea Boats in 1992. The design is based on the Cornish pilchard fishing boats. It is made from GRP and requires minimum maintenance. She has wooden spars and teak and mahogany trim. It is the perfect boat for exploring estuaries and rivers with a family on board.

She is stable with a weighty steel centreplate. She has a working boat rig, comprising of a jib and boom-less standing lug mainsail and mizzen. This is very flexible, and enables her to sail safely in a number of different wind conditions.
boat.name: Tiki
